title: ii) If the basic infrastructure of the development is done before the commencement of the building, then no need of the bank guarantee at the time of Master Plan
clause_text: ii) If the basic infrastructure of the development is done before the commencement of the building, then no need of the bank guarantee at the time of Master Plan. If the infrastructure is getting built before taking the building permission then in such cases also there is no need of Bank Guarantee.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
